START: ^A bard “Wymm Hasslefire” shows up to perform (uses most of your starter resources but significantly boosts morale).
^There’s an elf making some noise in the town square, he’s putting up flyers and screaming that there must be a show! The flyer says Wymm Hasslefire, the world-famous bard wants to put a concert on.
Help: ^You tell Wymm that he can perform, and you begin gathering resources to set up a stage. He performs a few days later giving your town a magical night to remember.
Leave: ^You realize you don’t have a stage, and it would cost too much to build one. Unfortunately, you have to tell him to leave.
Inn: ^You get him to perform in the Inn. Unfortunately, it’s not big enough for the whole town, but the people who went had a lot of fun.
